projects.name: GameVerse
projects.description: A decentralized gaming platform where players can buy, sell, and trade in-game assets as NFTs.
projects.referralReward: Get 10% off in-game purchases for every friend who signs up
incentives: 2. Access to beta versions of new games

projects.name: MusicBeats
projects.description: A platform for music lovers to collect limited-edition music tracks and album art NFTs.
projects.referralReward: Earn a free track for every 3 friends who sign up
incentives: 1. Discounted concert tickets for top referrers

projects.name: CryptoArt Gallery
projects.description: An exclusive collection of digital art pieces from top NFT artists around the world.
projects.referralReward: Earn 5% commission on every referred purchase
incentives: 1. Exclusive access to private art auctions
2. Early access to new art drops
